channel.title: Duping
channel.description: Hi i currently own a 30 player usual ran server, webclient and all, but i've been having one problem. Duping. I know it's obviously in the trade codes and i was just wondering if someone could help me fix this. I am an experienced coder and i do know what im doing but i just can't seem to find a trading code that isn't a pi one, i don't have a clickingmost.java, but the codes in there are in my client.java, they do work still. The duping problem i believe is the classic trade and decline problem which im sure is pretty simple for you coders. You could send me how to do it with step by step, or just go on teamviewer and i can show you some of the files so you could work on it. If you need any codes you wish me to submit that go along with my trading, accepting, and declining process's then just ask and ill be happy to post in a comment. Thanks

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

Gotcha, but the problem isn’t when they dissconnect it’s when theyre just trading, for instance if someone trades something and at the 2nd trade screen they quickly accept decline while the other person has allready accepted it gives them both the item. It’s a simple dupe but it loses me a lot of mula $$$. I just need the trading codes so i can replace them with my own. thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

to my understanding on this dupe when you log out it keeps your trade screen open which allows duping, although i have never delt with this dupe try working on making the trade screen close when one person “loses connection” that way the trade screen wont be open when the other person tries to except. Im probably not the most reliable because this sounds like delta and im mostly pi nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: Duping

@Meeper98 wrote:

Hi i currently own a 30 player usual ran server, webclient and all, but i’ve been having one problem. Duping. I know it’s obviously in the trade codes and i was just wondering if someone could help me fix this. You could send me how to do it with step by step, or just go on teamviewer and i can show you some of the files so you could work on it.
